snippet: The leader of the political opposition, Daw Aung San Suu Kyi, said Thursday that the official voter lists for parliamentary elections next month included the names of dead people.
abstract: Daw Aung San Suu Kyi, leader of Myanmar's political opposition, says that the official voter lists for the upcoming parliamentary elections include the names of dead people, raising questions about the potential for election fraud.
lead_paragraph: The leader of the political opposition, Daw Aung San Suu Kyi, said Thursday that the official voter lists for parliamentary elections next month included the names of dead people.

headline.main: Myanmar: A Warning on Voter Lists
headline.print_headline: Myanmar: A Warning on Voter Lists
